description: Bayram Ocal reflects on his many achievements since migrating to Australia in the late sixties, including contributing to the foundation of a Turkish Islamic society, an Islamic funeral service, a mosque and various Turkish language newspapers.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002010; Stories from the Turkish community : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2007
